name: Url-abridger
tagline: A Chrome extension to shorten the URL of current tab using bit.ly & copy the shortened URL to clipboard
body:
### Welcome to URL Abridger.
 
 URL Abridger is the Chrome extension to shorten the URL of the current tab using bit.ly and copy it to clipboard for further use / share by user 

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
 Developed by Parameshwaran B - @parameshyss , Aug - 2014

### Support or Contact
 Contact me @ parameshyss[at]gmail[dot]com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
